description:
This yearlong course (with IMED 660 and 662), presented by the Robert Wood Johnson Clinical Scholars Program, presents in depth the methodologies used in patient-oriented research, including methods in biostatistics, clinical epidemiology, health services research, community-based participatory research, and health policy.
Consent of instructor required.
title: Methods in Clinical Research, ...
long_title: Methods in Clinical Research, Part II
